text: My son hurt his head few times which is less than half a yr. When called n check with them, their region principal can tell us that the teacher aldy tried their best when she didn’t even look at the cctv. And the teacher statement can be very different which making me worries. When ask for cctv, the regional principle can tell me I can’t due to PDPA. The principle even said we got 疑心病. How not to when accident happened so frequent and is on head!

My son is with PCF Taman Jurong Blk 150. The teachers, centre admin, principals and aunties are warm. I received fortnight updates of class room activities. There is daily outdoor, termly field trips and sensory activities!
